item.title: Home lab extension with an Intel NUC 6th generation
item.description: For my home lab I bought a 6th generation Intel NUC. The Intel NUC has following specifications: Intel NUC6i3SYH Intel i3-6100u (Skylake) 2.3 GHz Dual Core, 3 MB cache, 15W TDP 2 memory slots for DDR4-2133 SODIMM memory, maximum is 32 GB memory Intel HD Graphics 520 GPU Intel I219-V GigabitÂ network adapter and Intel Wireless-AC 8260 WIFI adapter Option to install a 2.5" HDD/SDD and a M.2 SSD card (2242 or 2280) 4 USB 3.
